page.title: 02CORONETS 2
page.content:
The band goes out on weekends but mainly on Sundays because most of the children have other things to do on Saturdays. The main Gala is the Federation Gala. This is a competition to tell whether they are overall band of the year or not. We get trophies and medals if we win. There are individual medals and full band medals. We have a sash to sew them on. You can buy medals on a trophy stall. Many children in this area have had great pleasure being in the Coronets and have found it quite interesting.
{SARA BOOTH, EMMA GENTRY, KEVIN McGLONE
